extent.charseq: Iowa Supreme Court overturned Harrington's conviction

ldc_scope.charseq: The Iowa Supreme Court overturned Harrington's conviction in February, based on new evidence that prosecutors withheld police reports pointing to another suspect and that the state's key witness had recanted his testimony
Inmates usually are freed in such cases while prosecutors determine whether to seek a new trial
